treatment-md.title: Aleiodes (Hemigyroneuron) arabiensis Butcher & Quicke, 2015, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: First record of Aleiodes (Hemigyroneuron) (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Rogadinae) from the Arabian Peninsula: description of new species with remarkable wing venation convergence to Gyroneuron and Gyroneuronella
